title: A2UI Client Capabilities
description: Schema for the 'a2uiClientCapabilities' object, which is included in the 'metadata' field of every A2A message from the client to the server.

catalogUri.description: The URI of the custom catalog to use. This must be one of the URIs advertised by the server in its agent card.

inlineCatalog.description: An inline catalog definition. This can only be provided if the server's agent card indicates it accepts inline catalogs.
